TopicTitle: Easiest way to get the old Rockomax textures back while keeping Restock mod

Articles.Content:
I really like the restock mod. I have noticed I need to use "alt" to snap more often, not sure if thats the mod or not but it does not really bother me. What does is the textures for the Rockomax fuel tanks. I personally like the stock ones better. You can use the 8 size one to make a nice checkerboard pattern and that has been replaced with an ugly plain white texture. 

It is my understanding I can switch that back. Would anyone be willing to show me exactly how to get that done? I also like how the stock tank has more ridges or texture to them but I really miss the checkerboard pattern for my space stations. 

Thanks in advance.

25 minutes ago, Cuda418 said:

Would anyone be willing to show me exactly how to get that done?

No, but I'll happily refer you to the wiki pages that explain how:

  • https://github.com/PorktoberRevolution/ReStocked/wiki/Restoring-Stock-Parts
  • https://github.com/PorktoberRevolution/ReStocked/wiki/Asset-Blacklist-and-Whitelist
